SELECT B.NO , B.WRITER_NO , B.FIRST_APPLY_NO , B.MID_APPLY_NO , B.LAST_APPLY_NO , B.CATEGORY_NO , D.CATEGORY , B.START_TIME , B.FINISH_TIME , B.CONTENT , B.TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE , B.TO_CHAR(DOCUMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOCUMENT_DATE , B.REJECTION FROM BUSINESS_TRIP_FORM B JOIN DOCUMENT_CATEGORY D ON B.CATEGORY_NO = D.NO WHERE WRITER_NO = #{writerNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NO DESC) AS rnum, B.* FROM BUSINESS_TRIP_FORM B WHERE B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND ( (B.FIRST_APPLY_NO = #{loginMemberNo} AND B.FIRST_STATUS != 2) OR (B.MID_APPLY_NO = #{loginMemberNo} AND B.MID_STATUS != 2) OR (B.LAST_APPLY_NO = #{loginMemberNo} AND B.LAST_STATUS != 2) ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
